summary: A team of investigators attempt to stop a serial killer known as the Yorkshire Ripper from claiming his next victim, but uncover something far more terrifying.
cast: Warren Clarke|Paddy Considine|James Fox|David Calder|Nicholas Woodeson|Ron Cook|Maxine Peake|Tony Pitts|Jim Carter|David Morrissey|Eddie Marsan|Sean Harris|Tony Mooney|Shaun Dooley|Kenneth Oxtoby|Lesley Sharp|John Barber|Peter Mullan|Robert Sheehan|Kelly Freemantle|Julia Ford|Michelle Holmes|Charlotte James|Chris Walker|Tim Beasley|Katherine Vasey|Robert Angell|Robert Hudson|Joseph Mawle|James Weaver|Andrew Garfield|Benjamin Haller|Molly Howe|Darren Whitfield
title: Red Riding: The Year of Our Lord 1980
